donor_name: THE FORCE OF NATURE AID FOUNDATION
outputs.output_descr:
(Extended Project: 2011-2013 Under the New UNDAP)
UNDAF Outcome 6: Opportunities are created for diversification of the economy in selected regions.
UNDAP Output 6.2:  Food and Income security strengthened through agriculture and fishery sector diversification and market integration.
The objective of the project is to strengthen economic resilience of island communities and vulnerable groups including women and youth. The strategy involves building a upon the success and lessons learned from the past intevrentions to expand and commercialize farming and mariculture ventures in local communities.

(Original Project)
Output 1- Technical support and capacty building on integrated farming targeted to communities through farmer training, poultry keeping, extension of autopot systems, incorporation of leguminous plans.
Output 2 - Agriculture value-addition activities supported through processing activities
Output 3- Agriculture Entrepreneurship, Marketing and Private Sector Partnerships strengthened through entrepreneurship traininags, negotiation with resorts and facilitating farmers to access business services 
Output 4- Institutional support to Min. of Fish and Agriculture strengthened through restructuring of Male' nursery to expand services to farmers
